org.mvp4j
Interface Converter

public interface Converter

The converter class to convert an object value to an instance of specified type.

Use this to set a specific converter by calling AppController#setConverter(Converter)

The AppController will use the converter to convert component value before updating the associated model property value.

When developing an adapter class MVPAdapter, create a customized converter depending on the adapter and return it in the method MVPAdapter#getConvertor()

Method Detail

convertComponentToModel

java.lang.Object convertComponentToModel(java.lang.Object type,
                                         java.lang.Object value)
Convert an object value to an instance of specified type. If is not possible to convert throw a new IllegalArgumentException

Parameters:
type - the target type of the instance converted from the value object
value - the object value to convert
Returns:
the result of conversion
